original_text: And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said,
korean_text: 어떤 사람들이 성전을 가리켜 그 아름다운 돌과 헌물로 꾸민 것을 말하매 예수께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And as some spake of the temple,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 어떤 이들이 성전에 대해 말할 때,

sentences.original_text: how it was adorned with goodly stones
